subtitle: These rolls are perfect to serve with celery, leek or blue cheese soup.

method.text: Blend the cheese with the butter. Lay bread slices next to each other, slightly overlapping.
Spread the cheese and butter mixture over. Roll up to form a fat Swiss Roll shape.
Secure at regular intervals with cocktail sticks. Cut into even slices. Place under a preheated medium grill. Grill on both sides for 1-2 min until crisp and golden.

title: Cheesy toast rolls
